name: Tablatini
recipeIngredient: 8 stalks fresh lemon grass, 6 coarsely chopped and 2 halved crosswise

recipeInstructions.text: In medium saucepan, simmer pineapple juice with chopped lemon grass for 15 minutes; let cool. Strain into a jar, and chill.

Spear the pineapple wedges with the halved lemon grass stalks. To a pitcher with ice, add pineapple juice, vodka and lime juice. Mix, and strain into 4 chilled martini glasses. Add pineapple-wedge garnish.
